00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : FinalDump
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038

00054 
00055  SUBROUTINE FinalDump
00056 
00057 !  Common Variables
00058  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00059  USE Domain
00060  USE FluidParams
00061  USE MPIParams
00062  USE MPI
00063  IMPLICIT NONE
00064 
00065 !  Local Variables
00066  INTEGER :: i, j
00067  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00068  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Pin, Pout, Ro, R, Pdif, Perr, Umax, Ref, Vef, Vol
00069  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: distroMem, auxMem, mpiMem, totalMem, memUnitF, memUnitG, Mb
00070  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: UmaxLocal, UmaxGlobal
00071  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:5) :: dataLocal, dataGlobal
00072  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:3) :: memLocal, memGlobal
00073 
00074 
00075 ! Initialize
00076  Ro = bubbles(1,3)
00077  UmaxLocal     = 0.D0
00078  UmaxGlobal    = 0.D0
00079  dataLocal(:)  = 0.D0
00080  dataGlobal(:) = 0.D0
00081 
00082 ! Pressure inside and outside the bubble, maximum velocity and effective radius
00083  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00084    DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00085 
00086      R =  DSQRT( (DBLE(i)-bubbles(1,1))**2 + (DBLE(j)-bubbles(1,2))**2 )
00087      IF (R < (Ro - IntWidth)) THEN
00088        dataLocal(2) = dataLocal(2) + 1.D0
00089        dataLocal(4) = dataLocal(4) + p_f(i,j)
00090      ELSE IF (R > (Ro + IntWidth)) THEN
00091        dataLocal(3) = dataLocal(3) + 1.D0
00092        dataLocal(5) = dataLocal(5) + p_f(i,j)
00093      END IF
00094 
00095      IF ( phi_f(i,j) >= 0.D0 ) dataLocal(1) = dataLocal(1) + 1.D0
00096 
00097      Umax = DSQRT( u_f(i,j,1)*u_f(i,j,1) + u_f(i,j,2)*u_f(i,j,2) )
00098      IF ( Umax > UmaxLocal ) UmaxLocal = Umax
00099 
00100    END DO
00101  END DO
00102 
00103 ! Gather global data
00104  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(dataLocal, dataGlobal, 5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00105  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(UmaxLocal, UmaxGlobal, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00106  Vol = dataGlobal(1)
00107 
00108 ! Calculate compliance with Laplace Law
00109  Pin  = dataGlobal(4)/dataGlobal(2)
00110  Pout = dataGlobal(5)/dataGlobal(3)
00111  Pdif = Pin - Pout
00112  Perr = (sigma/Ro - Pdif)*Ro/sigma
00113 
00114 ! Calculate phase conservation
00115  Ref = DSQRT( Vol*invPi )
00116  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00117 
00118 ! Estimate memory usage (Mb)
00119  Mb       = 1.D0/( 1024.D0*1024.D0 )
00120  memUnitG = ( NX + 2 )*( NY + 2 )
00121  memUnitF = ( NX_f + 2 )*( NY_f + 2)
00122 
00123  memLocal(1) = 8.D0*( 18.D0*memUnitG + 10.D0*memUnitF )
00124 
00125  memLocal(2) = 8.D0*( 3.D0*memUnitG + 7.D0*memUnitF ) &
00126              + 4.D0*( 4.D0*( memUnitG + memUnitF ) )
00127 
00128  memLocal(3) = 8.D0*( 8.D0*( xsize_f + ysize_f ) + 4.D0*( xsize6 + ysize6 ) &
00129              + 40.D0 )
00130 
00131  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(memLocal, memGlobal, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00132  distroMem = memGlobal(1)*Mb
00133  auxMem    = memGlobal(2)*Mb
00134  mpiMem    = memGlobal(3)*Mb
00135  totalMem  = distroMem + auxMem + mpiMem
00136 
00137 ! Save data to file from the master node only
00138  IF( vproc == master ) THEN
00139    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "final.out", STATUS = "NEW", POSITION = "APPEND", &
00140         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00141    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00142      WRITE(10,'(A)')'*** Multiphase Zheng-Shu-Chew LBM 2D Simulation ***'
00143      WRITE(10,'(A)')'*** Dual Grid Implementation (MPI Parallel)     ***'
00144      WRITE(10,*)
00145      WRITE(10,'(A)')'INPUT PARAMETERS'
00146      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Total Iterations      = ',MaxStep+1
00147      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Relaxation Iterations = ',RelaxStep+1
00148      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in X Direction = ',xmax
00149      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in Y Direction = ',ymax
00150      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Number of X Partitions = ',mpi_xdim
00151      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Number of Y Partitions = ',mpi_ydim
00152      WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Total Number of CPUs   = ',mpi_xdim*mpi_ydim
00153      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Width       = ',0.5D0*IntWidth
00154      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Tension     = ',0.5D0*sigma
00155      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Mobility    = ',Gamma
00156      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'RhoL    = ',rhoL
00157      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'RhoH    = ',rhoH
00158      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'TauRho  = ',tauRho
00159      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'TauPhi  = ',tauPhi
00160      WRITE(10,*)
00161      WRITE(10,'(A)')'MEMORY USAGE (Mb)'
00162      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Distributions     = ',distroMem
00163      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Auxiliary Arrays  = ',auxMem
00164      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'MPI buffer Arrays = ',mpiMem
00165      WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Total Memory Used = ',totalMem
00166      WRITE(10,*)
00167      WRITE(10,'(A)')'OUTPUT RESULTS'
00168      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Effective Radius   = ',0.5D0*Ref
00169      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Phase Conservation = ',Vef
00170      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'(Pin - Pout)       = ',Pdif
00171      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Laplace Error      = ',Perr
00172      WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Parasitic Velocity = ',UmaxGlobal
00173      WRITE(10,*)
00174      WRITE(10,'(A)')'***       Simulation Finished Succesfully       ***'
00175      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00176    ELSE
00177      CALL MemAlloc(2)
00178      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00179      STOP "Error: unable to open output file 'final.out'."
00180    END IF
00181  END IF
00182 
00183  RETURN
00184  END SUBROUTINE FinalDump
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:56 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
